Summary._: Northbound [6] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Whitlock Av.

Summary._: Northbound [E] and [F] trains are running local from Queens Plaza to Forest Hills-71 Av because of a passenger requires medical

Description._:
Northbound [E] trains are running local from Queens Plaza to Forest Hills-71 Av.

Northbound [F] trains are running local from 21 St-Queensbridge to Forest Hills-71 Av.

Expect delays on [E], [F], [M] and [R] trains.

These service changes are because a passenger requires medical attention at Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av.
